description: "Created by the U.S. Army, this map of a small area south of Manila records Spanish and American trenches and troop and gun locations on the last day of the Spanish–American War (13 August 1898). Ground conditions (swamps, jungle, fields) are noted."
title: "Sketch   showing   positions   of   1st   Brigade,   2nd   Division,   8th   Corps,   in   operations   against   Manila"
